mil3.7.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.7.4:1.2_0: “Is that Nāgadatta as far as the Brahmā realm?”
mil3.7.4:1.3_0: “Great king, because that Brahmā realm passed away from that Brahmā realm, there’s a 40 kilometers that falls on the ground. And it’s so that they may not fall into the ground.”
mil3.7.4:2.2_0: Then, as easily as a strong person would extend or contract their arm, they vanished from the bank of the river Vaggumudā, and reappeared in the presence of the Buddha in the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.
mil3.7.4:2.3_0: so too, after comprehending the mind of a mendicant with psychic power, the multiplying themselves and becoming one again, so many hundreds there will come to ruin.”
mil3.7.4:3.1_0: A senior monk who brought the following:
mil3.7.4:3.2_0: “But great king, where do you believe in your native land?”
mil3.7.4:3.3_0: “Venerable, there’s a slow named Arched harp or slow, Sir.”
mil3.7.4:3.4_0: “Great king, how long is it that you must be indicated?”
mil3.7.4:3.6_0: “Great king, do you recall having some business there some business come up?”
